title: Shopify Listen + Add creator (E commerce)
job_overview:
Hi there.

For a starting E Commerce business I am looking for someone who is skilled in both listing and creating adds.
Idealy our workflow would be:
- I pass 3-6 products at the end of the week
- You list them and make the visuals for advertisement (meta mostly)
- I check the page and create the advertisement on Meta.
- We see if it works and reflect on what does and what doesn't
- Learn from that
- Repeat this proces every week,

As Is said it is a starting business. I am testing 3-6 new products every week.
We can grow together to make it a bigger business. Then your time and income can grow along.

Looking for someone with good communication skills. Not afraid to ask questions when stuff is unclear. Willing to learn. And grow along.
